scripts.run:all:dev: yarn deploy:dev && yarn build:frontend && yarn publish:frontend:dev
scripts.run:all:staging: yarn deploy:staging && yarn build:frontend && yarn publish:frontend:staging
scripts.run:all:prod: yarn deploy:prod && yarn build:frontend && yarn publish:frontend:prod
scripts.remove:all:dev: lerna run --concurrency 1 remove --scope 'frontend' -- --stage dev && lerna run --concurrency 1 remove --scope 'monitoring-*' -- --stage dev
scripts.remove:all:staging: lerna run --concurrency 1 remove --scope 'frontend' -- --stage staging && lerna run --concurrency 1 remove --scope 'monitoring-*' -- --stage staging
scripts.remove:all:prod: lerna run --concurrency 1 remove --scope 'frontend' -- --stage prod && lerna run --concurrency 1 remove --scope 'monitoring-*' -- --stage prod
scripts.print:name: lerna run print:name
